articles.title: Polygon Announces New ZK-Proof-Based Identity Solution - Crypto Briefing
articles.description: Polygon is developing a more secure and private way for users to pass KYC verification. Polygon ID is set to launch later in 2022.
articles.content:
Key Takeaways
